data.title: THE FINAL HOUR Original Lobby Card 3 Doug McClure James Drury Lee J.Cobb The Virginian
data.meta_description: The Final Hour, Original Movie poster
data.text:
The Final Hour (1963)

The international theatrical release of The Final Hour, the 1963 directed by Robert Douglas cowboy western Polish coal mining romantic love triangle melodrama (“A woman’s love was the spark that set the west ablaze!”; about Polish coal miners who move in, and that sparks a love triangle that ends in murder) starring Lee J. Cobb, Doug McClure, James Drury, Ulla Jacobsson, Roberta Shore, Jacques Aubuchon, Bert Freed, Don Galloway, and Dean Fredericks. Note that this was created from the season 1 finale (episode 30) of TV’s “The Virginian”.
